title: Say hello to Black Jack 1

Two years, I shall receive clinical training under the guidance of doctors in actual practice to be a doctor to obtain a license from the doctor. However, the monthly salary of Â¥ 38 000. To do so would be, a part-time job in the emergency doctor on call at the hospital the other night .......I'll draw a figure that will face hard and far from the ideal medical training Eijiro physicians have, in contradiction to the hospital and medical problems are having, while still suffering. author: Shuho Sato
